data.text:
Hi, Jo Constantz here. Welcome to our weekly Work Shift newsletter. We want to hear from you, so send me your thoughts on today’s topic and any other aspects of how work works. If you're coming to us by way of a friend or colleague, please consider signing up.

In a world where many value work-life balance as much as a paycheck, more workers are prioritizing time off and setting boundaries when out of the office. But many executives find taking a genuine vacation a tricky proposition given the weight of their responsibilities.
